attributes.action: Name young offenders in order that society can be aware of who they are.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: "They cannot be named" is always the cry when a young offender commits a crime hence they go on to commit further crimes. By re-introducing the naming of these persons the crime rate by the younger element would be significantly reduced.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
